movie.title: Killer Mom
movie.description_intro: When 14 year old Allison loses her father in a plane crash, three years after her adoptive mother died, she is devastated. - At the funeral, she is shocked to meet her real mom, Jessica. - Little does she and her half sister Sydni know that Jessica has a nefarious plan in the works. And she will stop at nothing to control the 40 million dollars Allison is inheriting.
movie.description_full: When 14 year old Allison loses her father in a plane crash, three years after her adoptive mother died, she is devastated. - At the funeral, she is shocked to meet her real mom, Jessica. - Little does she and her half sister Sydni know that Jessica has a nefarious plan in the works. And she will stop at nothing to control the 40 million dollars Allison is inheriting.

movies.title: The Saratov Approach
movies.summary: This riveting drama tells the true story of two young American Mormon missionaries held captive and brutalized for a week in a remote part of Russia.
movies.description_full: This riveting drama tells the true story of two young American Mormon missionaries held captive and brutalized for a week in a remote part of Russia.
movies.synopsis: This riveting drama tells the true story of two young American Mormon missionaries held captive and brutalized for a week in a remote part of Russia.

movies.title: The Field
movies.summary: "Bull" McCabe's family has farmed a field for generations, sacrificing endlessly for the sake of the land, and when the widow, who owns the field, decides to sell the field in a public auction, McCabe knows that he must own it. But while no one in the village would dare bid against him, an American with deep pockets decides that he needs the field to build a highway. The Bull and his son decide to convince the American to give up bidding on the field, but things go horribly wrong.

movies.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
movies.summary: After getting in a car accident, Michelle awakens to find herself in a mysterious bunker with two men named Howard and Emmett. Howard offers her a pair of crutches to help her remain mobile with her leg injury sustained from the car crash and tells her to "get good on those" before leaving the bunker. She has been given the information that there has been an alien attack and the outside world is poisoned. However, Howard and Emmett's intentions soon become questionable and Michelle is faced with a question: Is it better in here or out there?

movies.title: The Haunting Hour: Don't Think About It
movies.title_english: The Haunting Hour: Don't Think About It
movies.title_long: The Haunting Hour: Don't Think About It (2007)
movies.summary: Cassie's life changes when she moves and attends a high school ruled by the most beautiful girl in school, Priscilla, and her beautiful sidekicks. Priscilla immediately takes a dislike to Cassie, and soon it's a battle between the two. But when Priscilla goes missing, along with Cassie's younger brother, Max, Cassie must go on an adventure and search for them before it's too late...
